overview: This home video classic looks back on the career of the behemoth known as Diesel; at seven feet tall and more than 300 pounds of raw power, Diesel took on all comers during his iconic career.
tagline: This home video classic looks back on the career of the behemoth known as Diesel; at seven feet tall and more than 300 pounds of raw power, Diesel took on all comers during his iconic career.
title: Big Daddy Cool Diesel
